üìê Calculation Methodology (CENTRALIZED)

IMPORTANT: All percentages and statistics in this report use the SAME centralized calculation methods:
  • Meta Share % = (Archetype Matches √∑ 2) √∑ Total Unique Matches √ó 100
  • Win Rate % = Wins √∑ Total Matches √ó 100
  • Tier Score = (Win Rate √ó 0.6) + (Meta Share √ó 0.4) + Modifiers
  • Matches are divided by 2 because each match is counted twice (once per player)
